entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet pack on maccatalyst with Release config misconfigures search path for files #48041
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe, Version=6.0.1.0 on Framework leg #48036
  • Saving disk space by not copying transitive project references in libraries without transitive project references. #48035
  • Test templates: Don't add TestingPlatformDotnetTestSupport if user specifies MTP in dotnet.config #48031
  • (Immutable) collection properties break value based equality in records #48027

Closed

  • Support package@version syntax in `dotnet package add` #47981
  • Missing VS.Redist.* packages from SDK build #47950
  • Method 'System.IO.Directory.GetParent' not found in Microsoft.PackageDependencyResolution.targets #1967
    Backlog
  • Should DisplayVSMessage condition read from NETCoreAppMaximumVersion instead of UnsupportedTargetFrameworkVersion #44839

PullRequests

Created

  • Added 30 to the width and X location to make sure there is room for the progress label #48043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: Adjust namespaces to match folder layout #48042
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update baseline for VS redist assets #48040
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Only set DotnetTool package type if no package type is set #48039
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Only publish FSharp packages when needed #48033
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use PackageDownload in GeneratePackagePruneData #48030
    untriaged
  • Use Roslyn from SDK always for SDK-based project builds #48028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • allow @ syntax for package versions in package add #47961
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update baseline and split comparison report #48037
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #48025
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: "Use primary constructor" #47998
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Flow TargetArchitecture and TargetOS to inner repos #48024
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [SBRP Usage Report] Add target pack support and scan project.assets.json files for package downloads #47916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix buildArchitecture -> targetArchitecture renames in YML #48032
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make version identification slightly better #47987
    untriaged
  • Open Test1.cs in Visual Studio, not MSTestSettings.cs #47768
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use TargetArchitecture and TargetRid properties #47977
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixes #44839 to unblock runtime when changes TFMs #47960
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • dotnet CLI: More cleanup via VS tools #47995
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Installer job should fail if tests have failed #48015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47986
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make it possible to prep other RIDs and architectures #47956
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make all the properties in StaticWebAssetEndpoint lazy #47833
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Improve Post-Build Signing Validation in the VMR #47744
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary CA2022 suppressions #47904
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve MTP dotnet test exit code messages #47979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • `dotnet package list` command should restore first #47873
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
